word:
MR No. 168 - Ellen G. White Visit to Nimes, France, Oct. 16-31,1886

     [Note: Ellen G. White visited Nimes, France, in 1886 from Friday, Oct. 15 to Monday, Nov. 1. While there she spoke twelve times to the believers and other interested persons. Elder D. T. Bourdeau translated for her. The White Estate has in its records her diary jottings from day to day during this visit and ten of her twelve sermons presented there.]
